name: Double White
description: What do brewmasters do in their free time? If you're Phil Markowski, the obsesseive brewmaster of Southampton, you brew at home, of course! Phil turned his fascination with Belgian-style white ales into a quest to master one of the most challenging beers to brew. Using rustic ingredients like un-malted wheat, Phil experimented over his stove until he felt it was perfect. Take one taste and you'll agree, Phil got it "white."
style: Light American Wheat Ale or Lager
